title: The Xayah and Rakan gift icon
body: I didn't know that if you send xayah or Rakan with ip to a friend and after they also send on of them back to you , you can get a special icon. But I only learned this after I purchased the full bundle for xayah and Rakan, does that mean I have no chance to get that special icon anymore? Please help riot, me and my girlfriend really want that icon. Thank you.

replies.body: You can grab the icon through gifting Xayah or Rakan, not being the recipient of it.  There's a community post going on right now, [Xayah and Rakan Gifting Thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/MPd8wJoe-xayah-and-rakan-gifting-thread), if you'd like to participate.  Let me know if that clears things up!
Oh thanks, we just send some to our friends with rp, hasn't received the icon yet.
I did the same thing, except I gifted my friend Rakan.. didn't get the icon... and it's been two weeks.
me too all my friends that gifted got it already, but im just here, chilling.. without the icon :|
